connectorUiConfig.title: NordPass (using Azure Functions)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown:
The [NordPass](https://nordpass.com) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest sign-in attempts, item usage, and audit events from your NordPass Business account using the NordPass Events Reporting API. This allows you to monitor and investigate events in NordPass in Microsoft Sentinel along with the other applications and services your organization uses.

**Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**

This solution depends on the following technologies, and some of which may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or may incur additional ingestion or operational costs:

-  [Azure Functions](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/functions/#overview)
connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: These queries are dependent on a parser based on a Kusto Function deployed as part of the solution.

sampleQueries.query:
NordPassEventLogs_CL
 | summarize count() by user_email 
 | top 10 by count_

value:
NordPassEventLogs_CL
 | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
 | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

A NordPass Events API Token is required. [See the documentation to learn more about the NordPass API](https://developer.NordPass.com/docs/events-api/reference). 

**Note:** A NordPass Business account is required

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This connector uses Azure Functions to connect to NordPass to pull logs into Microsoft Sentinel. This might result in additional data ingestion costs from Azure. Check the [Azure Functions pricing page](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/functions/) for details.

>**(Optional Step)** Securely store workspace and API authorization key(s) or token(s) in Azure Key Vault. Azure Key Vault provides a secure mechanism to store and retrieve key values. [Follow these instructions](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/app-service/app-service-key-vault-references) to use Azure Key Vault with an Azure Function App.

**STEP 1 - Configuration steps for the NordPass Events Reporting API**

 [Follow these instructions](https://support.NordPass.com/events-reporting/#appendix-issue-or-revoke-bearer-tokens) provided by NordPass to obtain an Events Reporting API Token. **Note:** A NordPass Business account is required

**STEP 2 - Deploy the functionApp using DeployToAzure button to create the table, dcr and the associated Azure Function**

>**IMPORTANT:** Before deploying the NordPass connector, a custom table needs to be created.

This method provides an automated deployment of the NordPass connector using an ARM Tempate.

1. Click the **Deploy to Azure** button below. 

	[![Deploy To Azure](https://aka.ms/deploytoazurebutton)](https://linktodeployment)
2. Select the preferred **Subscription**, **Resource Group** and **Location**. 
3. Enter the **Workspace Name**, **Workspace Name**, **NordPass Events API Key**, and **URI**.
 - The default **Time Interval** is set to five (5) minutes. If you'd like to modify the interval, you can adjust the Function App Timer Trigger accordingly (in the function.json file, post deployment) to prevent overlapping data ingestion.
 - Note: If using Azure Key Vault secrets for any of the values above, use the`@Microsoft.KeyVault(SecretUri={Security Identifier})`schema in place of the string values. Refer to [Key Vault references documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/app-service/app-service-key-vault-references) for further details. 
4. Mark the checkbox labeled **I agree to the terms and conditions stated above**. 
5. Click **Purchase** to deploy.
